description:
Team Poképals is the main team in the anime
special Pokémon Mystery Dungeon: Explorers of Time & Darkness.
The two main Pokémon of the team are Chimchar and Piplup. The Piplup, however, is a human who turned into a Pokémon, and is at first reluctant to be in an exploration team.
Although not part of Team Poképals, Sunflora from the Wigglytuff Guild accompanies them on their first mission.
name: Pokedans
